railsapp.user_ids: Select id as user_ids from users where group_id in <group_ids>
railsapp.sg_ids: Select id as sg_ids from sub_groups where group_id in <group_ids>
railsapp.order_ids: select id as order_ids from orders where group_id in <group_ids>
railsapp.pul_ids: select id as pul_ids from product_usage_logs where group_id in <group_ids> or order_id in <order_ids>
railsapp.mc_ids: select id as mc_ids from merchant_communications where group_id in <group_ids> or order_id in <order_ids>
railsapp.po_ids: select id as po_ids from purchase_orders where order_id in <order_ids>
railsapp.p_ids: select li.plan_id as p_ids from orders o join line_items li on li.order_id = o.id where o.id in <order_ids>
railsapp.li_ids: select id as li_ids from line_items where plan_id in <p_ids> or order_id in <order_ids>
railsapp.plan_ids: select plan_id as plan_ids from app_live_testing_group_plans where group_id in <group_ids> UNION DISTINCT select plan_id as plan_ids from live_testing_group_plans where group_id in <group_ids> UNION DISTINCT select plan_id as plan_ids from app_automate_group_plans where group_id in <group_ids> UNION DISTINCT select plan_id as plan_ids from automate_group_plans where group_id in <group_ids>
